sheet.createDescription: Create a new chatbot response node. You can configure triggers and messages after creation.

form.name: Node Name
form.nameHelp: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only

trigger.title: Triggers
trigger.description: Define conditions that activate this node. When a user message matches any trigger, this node's messages will be sent.

message.title: Messages
message.description: Configure the bot's response messages. Messages are sent in sequence when the node is triggered.

delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

display.modalSubtitle: Save this key securely - you won't see it again
display.securityTip1: Store this key in a secure location (password manager, secure vault)
display.securityTip2: Never share it publicly or commit it to version control
display.securityTip3: Use environment variables or secure configuration management
display.securityTip4: Rotate this key regularly for enhanced security
display.warningMessage: This is the only time you'll see this API key. Copy it now and store it securely. You won't be able to see it again.

page.title: OAuth Providers
page.description: Configure OAuth authentication providers for user login

descriptions.providerType: Select the OAuth provider (cannot be changed after creation)
descriptions.providerTypeImmutable: Provider type cannot be changed after creation
descriptions.clientSecret: Secret credential from OAuth provider (encrypted before storage)
descriptions.updateClientSecret: Leave empty to keep the current secret
descriptions.enabled: Enable or disable this provider for authentication

messages.updateErrorDesc: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
messages.deleteErrorDesc: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

deleteDialog.title: Delete OAuth Provider
deleteDialog.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete **{name}**? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove this OAuth provider configuration.

sheet.createDescription: Configure a new OAuth provider for authentication.

empty.title: No OAuth providers found
empty.description: We couldn't find any OAuth providers. Try adjusting your filters or create a new provider.

page.title: OAuth Clients
page.description: Manage OAuth 2.0 client applications that can authenticate with your authorization server

descriptions.clientName: A friendly name for this OAuth client
descriptions.redirectUris: Valid HTTP/HTTPS URLs. Localhost allowed for development.
descriptions.pkceRequired: Enable for public clients (SPAs, mobile apps)
descriptions.pkceRequiredPublic: PKCE is always required for public clients
descriptions.confidentialType: Server-side applications with secure secret storage
descriptions.publicType: SPAs, mobile apps (PKCE required, no secret)
descriptions.clientTypeImmutable: Client type cannot be changed after creation

create.title: Create OAuth Client
create.description: Create a new OAuth client for your application. The client secret will only be shown once.

edit.title: Edit OAuth Client
edit.description: Update the OAuth client configuration. Changes will take effect immediately.

delete.title: Delete OAuth Client
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone. All applications using this client will stop working.

reveal.title: Reveal Client Secret
reveal.warning: Warning: This will temporarily reveal the client secret for {name}. The secret will be visible for 30 seconds.

securityNotice.title: Security Notice
securityNotice.point1: Only reveal the secret in a secure environment
securityNotice.point2: The secret will auto-hide after 30 seconds
securityNotice.point3: Make sure no one is watching your screen

remember.title: Remember
remember.point1: Store the secret securely if you haven't already
remember.point2: Never commit secrets to version control
remember.point3: This dialog will close in {count} seconds

secretDisplay.title: Client Secret Created
secretDisplay.warning: Important: Save this secret now - it won't be shown again!

bestPractices.title: Security best practices:
bestPractices.point1: Store in a secure location (password manager, vault)

toasts.createFailedDesc: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
toasts.loadFailedDesc: Could not load OAuth client data
toasts.copyFailedDesc: Failed to copy secret to clipboard
toasts.atLeastOneUri: At least one redirect URI is required

alerts.publicClientInfo: No client secret required. PKCE is required for all authorization flows.

credentialsDisplay.title: OAuth Client Created
credentialsDisplay.secretWarning: Client Secret - Save this now, it won't be shown again!

publicClientInfo.title: Public Client Setup
publicClientInfo.point1: No client secret required - use PKCE for security
publicClientInfo.point2: Include client_id in token requests via form body

empty.title: No OAuth clients found
empty.description: Get started by creating your first OAuth 2.0 client application. OAuth clients allow external applications to authenticate users through your authorization server.

emailVerification.title: Verify your email
emailVerification.description: We've sent a verification email to {email}. Please check your inbox and click the verification link to continue.
emailVerification.checkSpam: Can't find the email? Check your spam folder.
emailVerification.successMessage: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox.

login.title: Welcome to {brand}
login.subtitle: Sign in to access your dashboard
login.mockFormInfo: Username/password login is for visualization only. Please use OAuth login below.

callback.pleaseWait: Please wait while we complete authentication
callback.errorSubtitle: There was a problem signing you in

errors.invalidState: Invalid state parameter. Please try logging in again.

errors.accessDenied: Access was denied. Please try again.
